attributes.action: Sentence Baby P's abuser to death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Baby P abusers deserve the death penalty.It's not fair that the maximum sentence is only 14 years.
Life means life!
They have tortured this poor baby to death, let's sentence all of them to death!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
